Html:
Hello. I had some problems running this project, but now it works fine and I really enjoy it. Great work!!!

But I also get some minor (I hope) problems.
Because I can't recompile Your project (at the moment), I'm using debug library provided with source code. And I have problem with styling larger number of series. Everything after sixth series is red.
Is it posible to manually style further series without recompiling whole project? I just can't track Series styling point.

Best regards.
KyroPL

Hi KyroPL,

sorry for my very late answer.

Regarding your questions: Please try the new version (BETA). A lot has been improved and now you have more options for custom styling.
Check out the test applications (e.g. the SL version at http://www.tetracon.de/charts) and play with the different settings.

Cheers,
Torsten
